availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ambrose James Dudley (Madison County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan E Dudley. Father of J. Gilbert Dudley. Farmer in Madison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Division 1, p. 324.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 257B.
U.S. Civil War Draft Registration Record
U.S., Find a Grave Index, 1600s-Current, “Ambrose James Dudley (1836-1876)” https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=dudley&GSfn=a&GSmn=j&GSby=1840&GSbyrel=before&GSdyrel=all&GScntry=4&GSob=n&GRid=97984518&df=all& (Accessed February 12, 2017).
